sections.content: Building things and solving problems with code.
sections.heading: Having Fun

sections.content:
Engineering Made Simple

Hi, my name is Bobby, by day i’m a Front End Developer working for an awesome Digital Agency in Pacific Beach San Diego – Rosemont Media. By night, i’m a full time explorer of technology.

It’s only hard if you don’t understand it – my goal is to take complex technologies, concepts, and ideas, break them apart, learn how they work under the hood and build some cool things along the way.

Running and Coding

The Running Coder is a name that, well, is mostly self explanatory. I love to run and I love to code, running allows me to clear my head, organize my thoughts, push through physical and mental walls, and come up with some of my best ideas.

I hope you enjoy exploring this site. If you have any questions, ideas, or just want to say hi I would love to hear from you!
